column4: BRIEF-Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Reports Qtrly Consolidated Revenue Of $729.1 Mln Vs $722.6 Mln
column5: April 30 (Reuters) - Clear Channel Outdoor Holdings Inc :
column6: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR
column7: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC QTRLY CONSOLIDATED REVENUE $729.1 MILLION VERSUS $722.6 MILLION
column8: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC QTRLY CONSOLIDATED OPERATING INCOME $89.6 MILLION, DOWN 64.3 PERCENT
column9: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC - RECOGNIZED A LOSS OF $855.6 MILLION ON DUE FROM IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS NOTE DURING Q4 OF 2017
column10: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC - AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, WE HAD NO BORROWINGS UNDER REVOLVING PROMISSORY NOTE TO IHEARTCOMMUNICATIONS
column11: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS -DURING INVESTIGATION 3 BANK ACCOUNTS WERE OPENED IN NAME OF CLEAR MEDIA ENTITIES, WHICH WERE NOT AUTHORIZED
column12: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS - ERRORS FROM DEFICIENCIES IDENTIFIED AT CO’S CHINA BUSINESS ARE NOT MATERIAL TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS REPORTED
column13: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC- MATTERS DURING THE COURSE OF SPECIAL INVESTIGATION HAVE BEEN REFERRED TO POLICE IN CHINA FOR INVESTIGATION
column14: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC - DETERMINED THAT CHINA BUSINESS’ CONTROL DEFICIENCIES CONSTITUTE A MATERIAL WEAKNESS
column15: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR- ADVISED BOTH US SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION AND UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OF INVESTIGATION AT CLEAR MEDIA LTD
column16: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR HOLDINGS INC - MANAGEMENT CONCLUDED CO DID NOT MAINTAIN EFFECTIVE INTERNAL CONTROL OVER FINANCIAL REPORTING AS OF DEC 31, 2017
column17: * CLEAR CHANNEL OUTDOOR -CONTINGENT LIABILITIES FROM POTENTIAL MISCONDUCT THAT MAY BE IDENTIFIED BY INVESTIGATIONS NOT MATERIAL TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
